meanings.definition: The act of killing an infant.
meanings.sent1: The news reported a tragic case of infanticides in the city.
meanings.sent2: The community was shocked by the infanticides that occurred last night.
meanings.sent3: The play had a dark humor moment when the characters joked about infanticides.
meanings.sent4: The history books are filled with stories of infanticides during times of war.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the heartbreaking reality of infanticides around the world.

meanings.definition: People who commit the act of killing an infant.
meanings.sent1: The police were searching for the infanticides responsible for the crime.
meanings.sent2: The court sentenced the infanticides to life in prison.
meanings.sent3: In the movie, the villain was portrayed as a group of ruthless infanticides.
meanings.sent4: The novel's plot twist revealed the true identity of the infanticides.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to raise awareness about the dangers of infanticides.
